original_title: Rewriting the Book: A Tribute to a Storybook Season
overview: 2003 was a dream season for Ohio's Miami University RedHawks: This collection of game highlights recaptures the magic of the team's 13-1 season as they win their first MAC Championship since 1986; claim victory in the GMAC Bowl; and end the season No. 10 in the national ranking. The celebration continues with never-before-seen interviews with RedHawks players and coaches.
title: Rewriting the Book: A Tribute to a Storybook Season
